えっとーお菓子とか 食べたいかも

CONTENT: 安達さんは甘いものを求めていると
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So Miss Adachi would like some sweets?

CONTENT: ええっと うん お菓子
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um, yup... Snacks.

CONTENT: 甘くないお菓子?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Would you prefer something not sweet?

CONTENT: うん　えっと 甘いのでいいけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí, bueno, me conformo con algo dulce.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, er... Something sweet is fine.

CONTENT: さーて どこ行こうかね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, where should we go?

CONTENT: うん? 安達?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi?

CONTENT: いいかな?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Can I?

CONTENT: いいって?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Can you what?

CONTENT: ああー 手ね どうぞ　はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, my hand. Here. Go ahead.

CONTENT: で 甘いもの食べに行くんだよね?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, we're going to have something sweet, right?

CONTENT: ここにドーナツ屋がありますけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's a donut shop right here.

CONTENT: ない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They don't have it...

CONTENT: あんまり よくないかも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe not there.

CONTENT: そうなの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Really?

CONTENT: 和風のものが食べたいとか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Would you prefer Japanese sweets, then?

CONTENT: そういうのではないというか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No me refiero a eso. Creo que...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's not what I meant. I think...

CONTENT: お目当てのところとかあるの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you have somewhere in mind?

CONTENT: えっ いや...　うん ないけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, uh... No, I don't.

CONTENT: そういえばさ　聞いてみたいんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por cierto, quería preguntarte una cosa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, yeah. I wanted to ask you.

CONTENT: 私って 髪を染めるか 戻すかどっちがいいと思う?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Debería volver a teñirme o me dejo el pelo negro?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Should I dye my hair again or go back to black?

CONTENT: 黒いしまむらって見たことないから迷う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No estoy segura. Nunca te he visto con el pelo moreno.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm not sure because I've never seen you with black hair.

CONTENT: そりゃ 私は いつもおなか真っ白ないい子ちゃんだからねー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Soy la Blancanieves más pura que te vas a encontrar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, I am the purest little Snow White you'll find.

CONTENT: あっ ほら中途半端になってきたから　どうしようかなーと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es que me está creciendo el pelo y no sé qué hacer.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Look. My hair's starting to grow out, so I was wondering what I should do.

CONTENT: うん? どうかした?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is something wrong?

CONTENT: な... 何でもない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-It's nothing.

CONTENT: えっと ここでどう?　テイクアウトして ベンチで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué te parece aquí? Nos los podemos llevar y comer en un banco.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What about here? We can get takeout and eat on the bench.

CONTENT: 安達?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi?

CONTENT: あっ うん いいと思う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, uh, that's great.

CONTENT: えっ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: ちょっと持ち上げてみていい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you mind if I try lifting?

CONTENT: 何を?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Lifting what?

CONTENT: 日野を
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You.

CONTENT: なぜ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why, though?

CONTENT: できそうだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Because I think I can.

CONTENT: 立った! 私が立った!　ちょっ 痛い痛い
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm floating! I'm floating! Wait... Ow, ow.

CONTENT: こら 脇が痛い こらー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, my armpits hurt! Hey!

CONTENT: あー ごめん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, sorry.

CONTENT: でも 意外と重かった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pesas más de lo que pensaba.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You were heavier than I thought.

CONTENT: 何 失礼な感想を述べてんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Jeez, how rude can you be?

CONTENT: で あんたは何がしたかったの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, what exactly were you trying to do?

CONTENT: いやー日野なら できそうだったから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nada. Es que pensé que podía levantarte.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nothing. I just figured I could lift you up.

CONTENT: あー もういい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, never mind.

CONTENT: そういや今年もチョコいる?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: By the way, did you want chocolate this year?

CONTENT: 甘いの 好き
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I love sweet things.

CONTENT: ほいほい　じゃあ今年も何か買ってくるか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vale. En ese caso, te compraré algo otra vez.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Alrighty. I guess I'll buy you something again this year.

CONTENT: バレンタインと書いてあるね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Valentine's... It says Valentine's.

CONTENT: あるね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It sure does.

CONTENT: そ...そんな時期なんだ... ね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I... guess it's that time of year...

CONTENT: そうだね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yup.

CONTENT: で バレンタインが どうかしたの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What about Valentine's?

CONTENT: えっ あっ その...別に大した...ことじゃなくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Uh, I, uh... It's not... a big deal...

CONTENT: あっ 私か?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, me?

CONTENT: あっ 今のはその...　あの その...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: U-Um, I was just... Um, I...

CONTENT: 安達はバレンタインのポスターを私に見せるためだけにここへ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Me ha traído solo para ver el cartel de San Valentín?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did Adachi bring me here just to show me this Valentine's poster?

CONTENT: ややこしい いや 回りくどいなあと言うべきか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya son ganas. Bueno, ha sido un poco raro.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That was so much trouble. Or I guess I should just say that was a rather roundabout way of doing this.

CONTENT: 14日に しまむらは何か用事がありますか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you have any plans on the 14th, Shimamura?

CONTENT: ない ですけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I do not.

CONTENT: な... ないなら14日に遊ぼうという
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Entonces, ¿te apetece que salgamos ese día?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-If you don't, could we hang out on the 14th, maybe?

CONTENT: えーっと チョコが欲しいのかあげたいのか どっちなのかな?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... Do you want chocolate or do you want to give me chocolate?

CONTENT: えっ!?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?!

CONTENT: あの その... えっとー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I, uh... Um...

CONTENT: くれ... あっ ううん　どっちも　で こう 交換的な!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Dame. Bueno, da igual. Vamos a dárnoslo mutuamente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gimme. N-No, I mean, either. Or rather, let's exchange!

CONTENT: 友チョコかあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, friendship chocolate.

CONTENT: 日野と永藤あたりなら毎年やってそうだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hino y Nagafuji lo hacen todos los años.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm pretty sure Hino and Nagafuji do something like that every year.

CONTENT: あの2人みたいにすんなりできそうにはない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero no creo que esto termine tan bien como lo de ellas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I don't see this going as smoothly as it'd go for them.

CONTENT: 年季の差は歴然だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They've been doing this for years.

CONTENT: でも こういうのは当日パッと渡すから　ビックリして面白いんじゃない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero ¿la cosa no es dar el chocolate y que sea una sorpresa?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But isn't the point to give someone chocolate suddenly that day as a surprise?

CONTENT: 安達とは 何年ぐらい一緒にいられるんだろう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wonder how many years I'll be around Adachi.

CONTENT: 高校卒業まで?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe just until graduation?

CONTENT: いや 進級して別のクラスになったら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando pasemos de curso, quizás caigamos en clases distintas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Actually, once we move up a year, we might end up in different classes

CONTENT: そこで 途切れることだって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y puede que esto se acabe.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and that might be the end of it.

CONTENT: 私は私は分かっている方がいい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I... I prefer knowing.

CONTENT: あると分かる希望なら信じられるから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si sé que sucederá, tendré algo de esperanza.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Because there's actually some hope knowing it might happen.

CONTENT: そんなものかなうん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is that how it is?

CONTENT: それに まだ問題は山積み...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There're still plenty of problems.

CONTENT: 安達は 日常を走る流れの中から踏み出そうとしている
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Adachi estaba intentando salir de nuestra rutina.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi was trying to take a step out of the flow of our day-to-day life.

CONTENT: 踏み出す方向はなぜか いつも私を向いている気がしてならないけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No puedo evitar pensar que cualquier camino que toma se dirige a mí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't help but think that whatever direction she's taking, it's always facing me.

CONTENT: その決意とか覚悟は大したものだなあと感心してしまうのだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No puedo evitar admirarla por su determinación y resolución.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And I can't help but admire her determination and resolve.

CONTENT: だから 私は...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And that's why...

CONTENT: いいよ 今年はバレンタインやっちゃおうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Está bien. Este año celebraremos San Valentín.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sure. Let's do Valentine's Day this year.

CONTENT: 私にとって 毎日というのは灰色が延々と縄のように続くもので
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Todos los días me parecían grises y eternos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: For me, every day just seemed grey and endless.

CONTENT: だけど この日 2月4日
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But on this day, February 4th,

CONTENT: そこから始まる10日間は灰色の毎日に少しだけ 彩りを与える
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y los próximos diez días grises parecían contar con algo de color.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and the next ten days of grey, seemed to slowly have color added to them.

CONTENT: 《しまむらー》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura!

CONTENT: 死にたくなった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I want to die.

CONTENT: よっ お疲れー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, working hard?

CONTENT: おおー 晩ご飯のおかず?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Vienes a por algo para acompañar la cenar?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey. Getting side dishes for dinner?

CONTENT: まあね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yup.

CONTENT: えっと 今日はー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's see, today, I'll get...

CONTENT: しまちゃん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shima?

CONTENT: 樽見か!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Tarumi?

CONTENT: そうそう　久しぶりだね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, it's me! It's been forever.

CONTENT: しまちゃん 結構美人さんになった感じ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You sorta became really pretty.

CONTENT: 感じ? と聞かれましても
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Was \"sorta\" necessary?

CONTENT: はーい お待たせ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Here you go.

CONTENT: ありがとう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you.

CONTENT: またね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: See you later.

CONTENT: うん また
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, sure.

CONTENT: また かあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Later, huh...?

CONTENT: 電話番号 聞いておいていい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Can I get your number?

CONTENT: あっ うん いいけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh. Yeah, sure.

CONTENT: 永藤は見た 家政婦よりは 控えめに見た
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que he sido testigo de algo. Mucho menos que cuando un ama de casa ve algo, pero...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nagafuji had witnessed something. Much lower key than a housewife witnessing something, but...

CONTENT: ありがとう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks.

CONTENT: 帰ったら かけるね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te llamo cuando llegue a casa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll give you a call when I get home.

CONTENT: うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sure.

CONTENT: あー そういうわけでまたね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, yeah... Later.

CONTENT: あだしまペディア お正月
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adashimapedia: New Year's.

CONTENT: ワッツアップ 永藤だよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's up? Nagafuji in the house!

CONTENT: チェケラッチョ 日野だぜ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yo, check it out! Hino here!

CONTENT: ユーは 正月 海外旅行?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You went overseas for New Year's?

CONTENT: オー イエス おみやーげ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, yes! Souvenirs.

CONTENT: マカダミアナッツチョコ 超ベタなやーつ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Had to get the ol' chocolate-covered macadamia nuts?

CONTENT: 文句言ってんじゃねえよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Quit your complainin'.
